sentences.sContent: The education secretary was pilloried by the press for his latest proposals.
sentences.sCn: 教育部长因其最近的提案而受到新闻界批评。

remMethod.val: 著名戏曲《苏三起解》中苏三戴着的刑具就是pillory (颈手枷)

trans.tranCn: 给…上颈手枷；使…惹人嘲笑
示众；颈手枷；使惹人嘲笑
trans.tranOther: a wooden frame with holes for someone’s head and hands to be locked into, used in the past as a way of publicly punishing someone
